```{r}
library(timevis)
```

Data
```{r}
data <- data.frame(
  id      = 1:7,
  content = c("Attend Collaborative Collision", 
              "Organize the Team", 
              "Submit Proposal", 
              "Statistical Modeling/Residual Analysis",
              "Site Visits", 
              "Etc",
              "Submit NSF Proposal"),
  start   = c("2019-04-16", "2019-04-16", "2019-05-24", "2019-05-20", "2019-06-20", "2019-09-05", "2020-02-01"),
  end     = c(NA          , "2019-04-22",          NA , "2019-06-13", "2019-09-01", "2019-12-10", NA)
)
```

```{r}
timevis(data, showZoom = TRUE)
```

Data with groups
```{r}
data <- data.frame(
  content = c("Attend Collaborative Collision", 
              "Organize the Team", 
              "Submit Proposal", 
              "Statistical Modeling/Residual Analysis",
              "Site Visits", 
              "Etc",
              "Submit NSF Proposal"),
  start   = c("2019-04-16", "2019-04-20", "2019-05-24", "2019-05-20", "2019-07-20", "2019-10-05", "2020-02-01"),
  end     = c(NA          ,           NA,          NA , "2019-07-13", "2019-10-01", "2019-12-10",           NA),
  group = c(1, 1, 1, 2, 3, 3, 1))
```

```{r}
timevis(data, groups = data.frame(id = 1:3, content = c("Planning", "Quantitative Methods", "Qualitative Methods")))
```
